name: Pixel Press: Draw Your Own Video Game
blurb: Pixel Press is an iOS & Android app that lets you draw your own video game level (no code required!) and share it with others.

rewards.reward: No Reward

I HEART PIXEL PRESS // You want to show your support, and we are truly grateful! Exclusive access to project updates + a special VIDEO thanks of our team doing a remake of our childhood Michael Jackson dance! - see www.vimeo.com/robinrath/mj \u25cf Included with all rewards.

PIXEL PRESS GAME EARLY BIRD  // A download of the game for iOS devices (iPod Touch, iPhone, iPad Mini & iPad) at our special early bird price! Your option of Android (phone & tablet) version if stretch goal reached. PLUS you will get the official "Backer" Badge on your profile showing you were here from the start. Thank you!  \u25cf PLUS if you post a message to our Facebook wall (fb.com/pixelpressgame) or tweet with #pixelpress, you'll get an EXTRA copy for your little brother or sister.

PIXEL PRESS GAME // A download of the game for iOS devices (iPod Touch, iPhone, iPad Mini & iPad). Your option of Android (phone & Tablet) version if stretch goal reached. PLUS you will get the official "Backer" Badge on your profile showing you we're here from the start. Thank you! \u25cf PLUS if you post a message to our Facebook wall (fb.com/pixelpressgame) or Tweet with #pixelpress, you'll get an EXTRA copy for your little brother or sister.

ANDROID BACKER // To celebrate our Android users! Game Download + Pre-Printed Sketch Pad with special Android Logo + the Android "Backer" Badge (both available with all packages at this level and above if you are an Android user) PLUS all users at all levels that choose the ANDROID Game Download will get a special playable Android Robot character to use in their levels!
GAME & SKETCH PAD // Game Download + Pre-Printed Sketch Pad (Sketch Pad delivered in Aug/Sept to give you extra time to create your levels!)
GAME + STICKERS + EXTRA COPY // 2 Game Download (one for you, one for your little brother or sister) + Sketch Pad + Pixel Press STICKERS!!! \u25cf Only this package includes 2x Game Downloads

TEACHER PACKAGE // Our special teacher package (cause teachers are awesome) includes 10 Game Downloads + 3 Sketch Pads + 10 Stickers + exclusive access to the educational portal (focusing on using Pixel Press in the classroom) on our website. Must validate by sending us an email from your school address - anytime AFTER our Kickstarter is over. \u25cf This package is not included with any other packages.

GAME + POSTER + DIGITAL ART BOOK  // Everything in the $25 Game & Pad package plus our special "Ryo the Ninja" poster and our digital art book, a specially created eBook that includes behind-the-scenes photos and artwork from the creation of Pixel Press.
T-SHIRT // The Pixel Press T-Shirt (Your choice on size, American Apparel brand, shipped in Aug/Sept) \u25cf Includes all previous rewards (1 Game Download)

OFFICIAL BETA TESTER // Invite to become a pre-release Tester (and get the official "Beta Tester" Badge on your profile), also gives you access to the exclusive message boards + Bonus Credits for downloading new level artwork and game features \u25cf Includes all  previous rewards (1 Game Download)

PIXEL PRESS THREADS // You can't wait for Pixel Press and are willing to throw $100 our way to make it happen. For real. This package includes everything previously (1 Game Download) plus our Pixel Press embroidered HOODIE and T-SHIRT (Your choice on size, American Apparel brand, shipped in Aug/Sept).

THE KAWECO SPECIAL EARLY BIRD // Amazingly crafted, metal 0.5mm Kaweco Special mechanical pencil - shipped from Germany - featuring a hand-applied Pixel Press logo ($75 value, shipped in Aug/Sept), at our special early bird price! SEE PICS IN OUR DESCRIPTION. \u25cf Includes all previous rewards (1 Game Download, choice of T-Shirt or Hoodie).

TEACHER KING HIPPO // You asked for it and here it is, the ultimate teacher package! 25 game downloads + 10 Sketch Pads + 25 Stickers + exclusive access to the educational portal + exclusive classroom 1-on-1 hour-long web cam session with the creators + "King Hippo Mode" badge for all 25 downloads, giving your classroom devices free downloads for life (see KING HIPPO MODE below). Must validate by sending us an email from your school address - anytime AFTER our Kickstarter is over. \u25cf This package is not included with any other packages. Includes Beta Tester access.

KING HIPPO MODE // The "King Hippo Mode" badge on your profile, gives you access to lifetime upgrades for free, and other cool features we'll share with you only later. Also incudes the Exclusive Level Assets Pack for building levels that only "King Hippo" Mode users will have. \u25cf Includes all previous rewards, including the Kaweco pencil, T-Shirt & Hoodie (1 Game Download).

GAME BOX + ART BOOK // The ultimate fan collectible, we'll create an actual Nintendo-style game box of "Ninja Fury", our first Pixel Press level + a finely-printed art book featuring behind the scenes photos and artwork from the creation of Pixel Press.  \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $200 and less, including King Hippo, the Kaweco pencil, T-Shirt & Hoodie (1 Game Download).

THE SILVER BALLROOM LAUNCH PARTY // We're keeping our launch party for real and local. Join us at The Silver Ballroom, St. Louis' own pinball bar, where you'll enjoy a night of free music, food, drinks, and unlimited pinball action. Space is limited (88 people), so if you want in, this is your ticket! 21 and up only. Transportation not included. Package includes ticket for you and a guest.  \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $100 and less, choice of T-Shirt or Hoodie and the Kaweco pencil.

FIRST 100 LEVEL DESIGN // Already thinking of level ideas? Get the First 100 Level Design Token, giving you the privilege of being one of the exclusive first 100 users to upload a user submitted level (includes a "First 100" badge on your level and your profile) + Hand-signed sketch sheet signed by the entire Pixel Press team. + Your level will also featured in a special area of the Pixel Press app thanking you for your contribution. \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $200 and less, including King Hippo, the Kaweco pencil, T-Shirt & Hoodie (1 Game Download).

THE HI-IMPACT STUDENT WORKSHOP // \u2028\u2028Our student workshop package includes four (4) 1-hour long video-chat sessions where we explain to your students the principles of video game creation, including sketching & level layout, testing, design, and audio. In these sessions we'll explain core concepts, show them how to build them in Pixel Press, and then answer questions - your class will also get special recognition on our website. Package includes 30 game downloads + 10 Sketch Pads + 30 Stickers + exclusive access to the educational portal + "King Hippo Mode" badge for all 30 downloads, giving your classroom devices free downloads for life (see KING HIPPO MODE). Must validate by sending us an email from your school address - anytime AFTER our Kickstarter is over. \u25cf This package is not included with any other packages. Includes Beta Tester access. \u25cf By participating in this package you are in not associating yourself with hi-impact, and your information and privacy will be maintained.

CUSTOM BOX ART + PRINT // We'll design a custom Nintendo-style game box, in our own Pixel Press style, printed and assembled just for you - themed after any concept you like (must be kid friendly!). Your Box Art will be featured in a special area of the Pixel Press app thanking you for your contribution. \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $200 and less, including King Hippo, the Kaweco pencil, T-Shirt & Hoodie (1 Game Download).

YOUR THING IN THE GAME // You give us an idea of something you want in one of the featured game levels (such as your dog, but must be kid friendly!), plus you'll get original artwork of your design.  \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $200 and less (1 Game Download).

FIRST 10 LEVEL DESIGN + 3D PRINT OF LEVEL + BOX ART + PRINT // For our most dedicated backers! You are involved in level design, creative, and audio direction of your own featured Pixel Press level, and you get to define the character design and story for that level. Because this will be one of the first 10 levels that comes with Pixel Press, it's the ultimate way to get involved early in the creation of Pixel Press! Your level will also be featured in a special area of the Pixel Press app thanking you for your contribution. PLUS We'll create a 3D print of your level and a custom Nintendo-style game box of your level design, all put in a shadowbox frame to show off your hard work. Brand promotion ok if kid friendly, and as long as we can do it with style. \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $200 and less (1 Game Download) and the LAUNCH PARTY INVITE described above.

PIXEL PRESS AMBASSADOR // With this package you are going above and beyond to ensure that Pixel Press is created, and we want you to be a part of helping us drive the future development of the Pixel Press platform. We'll look forward to feedback from you on how to continue to drive both the education and "fun-factor" elements of the game, and to help us determine what genres to focus on in future Pixel Press editions. \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $200 and less (1 Game Download) and the LAUNCH PARTY INVITE described above. Legal terms will apply, strictly does not include any ownership stake in the company.

KONAMI CODE // You define the Pixel Press equivalent of the Konami Code. UUDDLRLRBA + START. For real. \u25cf Includes all previous rewards $200 and less (1 Game Download) and the LAUNCH PARTY INVITE described above.
